sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> of (odd-looking) <radical>lion</radical>s puts a <radical>drop</radical> of magic liquid on his face to look like a <radical>person</radical> <kanji>resemble</kanji>s someone else. The leader of lions is going incognito, so he needs to resemble a person who is not himself. He takes this drop of powerful face paint and transforms.
meaningInfo: Watch this leader as the transformation takes place. Now he doesn’t resemble anything like the leader he used to be. He doesn’t look like the same person. Watch him morph in your head.
readingMnemonic:
Now he <kanji>resemble</kanji>s an even greater leader, and all the lions get down on one <reading>knee</reading> (<ja>に</ja>) to pay their respects.

(Note that we recently changed this kanji's main reading from <ja>ね</ja> to <ja>に</ja>, because <ja>ね</ja> is an irregular reading.)
readingInfo: See all the odd-looking lions respectfully getting down on one knee? They look even odder now.
